Name: Fairmont Dubai
Reviews: Best brunch in Dubai in my opinion. Excellent food, unlimited Moet and really good service. Exchange stays superb. Dubai changes but my favourite restaurant never does. Lovely! Cavalli Club looks like an old woman's boudoir! Those who do make the cut will find a lavish interior, baroque in style, with glittering lights and a DJ booth We r the celebrity overnight Did you know? The building design is based on a modern interpretation of an Arabic wind tower or "barajeel." The four "pyramids" atop each of the structure's corners represents four wind towers. Fairmont Dubai will be lit in pink to support Breast Cancer Awareness Month during the entire month of October. Let's stand together to find a cure. www.bcacampaign.com Brunch is great. Lots of different varieties of food also a brilliant array of desserts and cheese! You'll leave very full!! Night life here is a blast...! Good hotel and lives up to the Fairmont reputation, however it's age is starting to show and with so many new hotels on Sheikh Zayed Rd it's not "the" hotel anymore. Best place to stay while in Dubai at the Fairmont Hotel - President Club The Fairmont Dubai is a place where luxury meets impeccable service. Some of the highlights include their 10 entertainment venues, their Exchange Floor, and The Spa, which offers the best treatments. This place has the most beautiful pool ive ever seen Try the steaks at Exchange grill recently voted best steak steakhouse in Dubai Go to Spectrum One for Friday Brunch. Awesome. Become a member of the Fairmont President's Club and enjoy the perks of being a VIP! :) You've arrived! Time to relax and get a good night's sleep. Check out these sleep tips from LARK by clicking on the link to help you get extra relaxed Impeccable brunch! You'll enjoy various types of cuisine here including Japanese and Mediterranean. Amazing hotel, excellent food. Still exploring... Love the architecture Great serves ,nice people amazing food ? Oh yeah that's fairmont Dubai Ôëç I choose the most spectacular hotel in Dubai: Fairmont Hotel :) There is a luxury night club, Roberto Cavalli in the luxury hotel. Have a good time! Rithcelle is the best server at a buffet I have ever experienced. They should open a school and train other on her model. The best massage I ever had. Nice pool. Nice & amazing place to stay.. love it En el hotel de al lado est√° el restaurante japon√©s OKKU, la mejor comida japonesa que he probado. Cavalli's closed for renovation üòï Luxurious and Fancy Visit us next door at the 7th floor of Conrad Dubai. IZEL is a one of a kind venue that brings together the absolute best of Latin American food, entertainment and cigars.

Loads of free benefits including cakes brought to your room mid day - Mmmmm Pretty impressive! excellent service & if you stay in Club room extras are great incl free afternoon tea & drinks in evening. Worth every dirham! √ìtimo hotel. Comprei pela internet, com acesso ao Clube Lounge. Atendimento perfeito, com 12 op√ß√µes de restaurantes. Vale a pena ficar aqui. Good squash and tennis courts, along with other sports facilities (ping pong, volleyball, football, water sports). All for free! Tower rooms are the best, but half of the rooms have a site construction view - ask for 13 or 14th floor to avoid Wifi is available in the lobby, all the rooms and also near the biggest pool. Free wi fi , free fruits, cakes in number in tower. Name: BarZar
Reviews: Great shisha, ask for the special one! Have a BarZar Burger, with BarZar fries!!! great place Promotion Double Up Wed. Order any drinks from the selected list pay add. 10AED to double it up. Tab Night pay 50AED and get 5 drinks from the selected list Thirsty Thursday Drinks from selected list for 18 only 5 Sunday 5 half pint of beer and 5 tasty treats on a shared platter=150AED Thursdays is TAB NIGHT @barzar get 5 selected drinks for only 80AED Tuesday night !!!!  just don't expect to feel well on Wednesday Tuesdays & Saturdays are BarZar's famous TAB CARD nights! Don't miss you :) (90dhs = 5 selected drinks) && is open till 3am :D Great atmosphere. Name: Cactus Cantina
Reviews: Rudy, the foods not what it used to be.. An old hidden gem in Rydges Plaza. I've been going there since I was a kid. The margarita is the best in town. The food is not bad. The Tortilla chips & salsa are the BEST! The staff is awesome too. If u want to feel at home, yet be served!! The team rocks! Luv the sunday mexican night.. Classic tex mex... Try the blackened Dori. Amazon Thursday night Cien Club-5 drinks for AES100! The veg fajitas and potato skins are amazing!! And don't forgety to order a large pitcher of lime margarita :) Buena carne  bien sazonada, los platillos regulares, mucho comino en los frijoles, deben mejorar el arroz de guarnici√≥n, aunque como tal la comida es secundaria por el tratamiento de bar que tiene The tacos and the Spanish rice taste amazing at cactus cantina ! Get there early on the weekends for a good spot to sit in Just when you think the decor could not be any tackier, a trip to the Ladies' restroom will leave you in giggles!!!!

Mark is the best barman ever!! used to be good but not anymore. its a trash and the cocktail mixes are bad... its not like how it used to be Man up Monday... Deals for men only... Try the spicy chicken wings... If u finish them it's on the house... I tried but couldn't make it ;( Try the pub platter (deep fried calamari - chicken wings - wedges & spring rolls) Slow slow slow slow slow slow slow slow slow slow slow slow slow SLOW service today. Dis-interested staff Baby Lyn is the best waitress ever Uffff awful! Music and crowd maybe its coz Euro is on No "specials" for Foursquare users. Sucks! C'mon Foursquare. Make this app and our loyalty worth something. Get the discounts going. Awesome Friday brunch with unlimited food and alcohol and great music Really good music! I love to hang out at this place when there's a world cup or a euro cup.. It's always a pretty exciting atmosphere over there! Great spot I wanna dance

Name: Boudoir
Reviews: Clubbing @ Boudoir : Thrusday, Friday and Sunday Night ! Tuesday night - Ladies Night, fress champagne for ladies all night and the music is a mix between r'n'b, hip hop with an arabic fusion. Absolutely packed so arrive before 1am. Saturday Nights- Desi Music is the Best nice R&B music! always crowded. be here to experience the nightlife of dxb (: One of the best clubs in Dubai! Finishes at 3:00am! They play a lot of commercial house, and R&B.... Try the Dudu..good shot. Great R&B music. Parking is an issue and can cause traffic jams. I guess stags are allowed! Overall, do check out one! Guys Friday night they play the worst music... I thought it's a ladies night.. Or t Went on Thurs night. It's fun but the music is too mainstream for me (commercial RNB and house). An ultra-chic restaurant and club in one, enter this elegant Parisian-styled venue. One of the most exclusive in the city and absolutely the place to see and be seen in Dubai... members only, so know someone.  The most exclusive club in Dubai, you won't be disappointed. OMG, just wayyyy toooo beautiful! Nice but expensive Don't go to the bathroom alone lol The crowd was exceptional and the host was very pleasant as well   Coming from Canada I don't get to see this hospitality... So again thank you Dubai The lowest class public in whole Dubai !!! So gross!!! Only hookers and pickuppers. But music is really kool. The only good thing.

Great Hotels! check out http://www.westinminaseyahi.com/ You must go and try the yum cha or yummy cha every Saturday... If you want a great place to take some amazing scenic photographs, this is the location! Do the Blue Orange... The ambiance and food are second to none! Bubblicious!!! wooow love this one.. Good  vibes on Tuesday's Try the beef burger, is awesome. @ the Blue Orange Friday Brunch! Awesome! Lovely hotel!!!! I like breakfasts here:))) Your ideal luxury playground on the beach. Best activities here are lounging at the private beach and swimming at the clear waters of the Arabian Gulf. Great hotel....staff very kindly The view in the evening@the Barasti bar smoking sisha and drinking a nice cocktail.... Marvelous food. Nice hotel. Overpriced drinks, aggressive clientele, overzealous security and school disco music. Tolerant and lovely cleaning staff. One Of my fav. Hotels in UAE ! The hotel is just great! Breakfast is amazing. Name: Goodfellas
Reviews: Try their Friday Brunch. 5 Drinks + Breakfast + Lunch for AED 99. Between 12-5PM. Try the 20-20 specials. They're all good! TIGER BEER!!!! Whatever you do, don't order the tap. The beer is horribly watered down

Name: Champs Bar   Grill
Reviews: Good venue for some loud live music. They gave out some free shots when we were there. Select 10 buck drinks for ladies all week! Serve pork. Aawesome live rock and metal bands here on Metal Asylum nights. Down-to-earth ppl! It's called Champs Bar & Grill now!

Name: Uptown
Reviews: The view is absolutely amazing.  One of the best places to sit and enjoy a few drinks. Name: Champions Sports Bar at JW Marriott Hotel Dubai  Official Marriott
Reviews: Play lots of pool! Bail when Mario is @ the decks..... Happy trippin Happy hours from 6 to 10. Screwdriver at aed 19 at 50%off Three drinks and a specialty platter for aed 95

Name: The Cigar Bar
Reviews: Genial Cohibas ;) One of the older cigar bars in Dubai, but still my favourite. Heavy leather couches and a massive selection of cigars and good whiskeys. Staff are knowledgeable and attentive as well.

Name: Bahri Bar
Reviews: Good cocktail bar with amazing view of Burj Al Arab Gently lit with olde-worlde Arabic-themed lanterns by night and bathed in glorious sunshine by day, Bahri Bar is one of the city‚Äôs pricier, swankier drinking spots, where even the amber beverages are Great atmosphere in a well designed room. (via Scoville) Love this place for its elegance & amazing scenery. Grab a table on the terrace that overlooks the Madinat waterways, then order one of the expertly-mixed cocktails and soak up the peaceful atmosphere The best place to enjoy my drink. Sit outside, listen to live jazz music and try their Martini..Beautiful location too.. One of my favorite bars in Dubai, chilled out with great views of the Burj Al Arab Every Friday. Beat Session. Buy 1 Get 1 free for every African Eastern Drinks. From 4to8pm 04-3666130 good music and cocktails Good view for Burj alarab, if you are hungry don't order burger, its so small My regular 'must go' place in DXB 2 Pink Prosecco for ladies between 8-11 on Tuesdays

Name: Hibiki Music Lounge
Reviews: spending time with my frendz........ If your songs happen to be unavailable, you can get your own karaoke songs on a CD and Florence "the Manager" will play it for you. So freakin friendly n warm

Name: Jockeys
Reviews: You don't know Dubai until you've slummed it in Jockeys Still the best bar in Bur Dubai!

Name: Long s Bar
Reviews: Great beer. Great atmosphere. And great nuts. Perfect for a beer after work! Lamb shanks nom! Dont go much even though its next to my house. a bit dodgy in one corner cuz of the working girls. otherwise not bad for a quick drink before heading out. Come watch the live broadcast of the Champion's League at Long's Bar on Saturday, 28 May'2011 to win : It‚Äôs a fairly authentic reproduction of a spit ‚Äôn‚Äô sawdust American bar ‚Äì expect football on the TV, good-value drinks, tasty food, and rowdy revelry at the weekends. Can get very crowded on weekends which means you'll have to wait a while for a drink, but worth a visit none the less! Very slow bar service even for regulars but all good Best everyday meeting spot in town!!! Too smoky for my liking. Ladies Nights on Mondays. Wine for the ladies from 9 pm  to 12am. Decent tap selection. Good place to wash sand from the throat. Great pub. Every where is dance floor. Excellent place for a regular drink day....though gets little crowdy on event days. Brilliant bar. Happy hour last all day until 8pm only days. Avg price for two drinks 50 Dhs. For Dubai, that's very good. Rose Rayhaan guests can charge to their room too. Good place to start with I don't like this place. It's like an underground dungeon :/ Been visiting this bar since 2009 and i feel like this is my second home!

Reviews: Mehfil now charges 100 dirhams for entry. Used to be one of the best but not any more. The only reason you should go is for the Chili Chicken and Butter Chicken -- go during the week so you'll find it empty.

Reviews: Try the happy hour between 7 pm - 9 pm. 50% off on selected beverages Happiest hour, this side of town!

Name: Studio One
Reviews: Burger and a pint not bad!!! American themed sports bar with sport on the TV. Good service and good place for a pint or two prior to dinner while the Mrs is still getting ready. Happy hour is a bonus!

Name: Splash Pool Bar
Reviews: Amazing view, great food, awesome place to chill, don't forget ur shades (H)

Name: Glasshouse
Reviews: Used to be my favorite restaurant in town. A Gordon Ramsey restaurant. Unfortunately the upkeep has been shoddy and so is the service, though the food remains nice. Actually the food and service have been impeccable. Wonderful food, wine and service ... looks very good

Reviews: If u come to Dubai, Irish village is what not to miss. Great place to watch the football game If you want a healthy alternative to their luscious tasty steaks, the village salad is great! So are all the drinks. St trope fillet steaks are delicious My best place during winter! Reserved to my drinking Mate... Having a beer with friends outdoor. Best place to be! enjoying staying outdoor! An Irish pub popular with expats for its pond-side ‚Äòbeer garden‚Äô. No happy hour, but there‚Äôs Guinness and Kilkenny draft. Have anything from the menu, everything is exceptional Def must visit, esp during winter  - lively, grt choice of food and ever popular irish pub - cellar. A bit expensive Old Time Fav. Wonderful Place Take a break at the Irish Village when at the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships in February. This fun pub overlooks a pond & fountain and is a replication of an actual Irish Village. good craic Nice place... With perfect athmo... My god you are so close to a Wild Peeta Gourmet Shawarma outlet and we deliver between 10am & 10pm. Call 800-9453(Wild) for a wholesome meal. Great in the cooler days for a beer outside! Nice tent and bar outside during summer. Heineken pint extra cold on a hot night is just what the doctor has ordered Perfect place to have a beer when the weather is good Try the village fry, you'll need a lot of guinness to wash it down! Music sucks for a Thursday night!!!! If you need to kill time at the airport, come here and hang out instead. Look out for the duckssss Try the apple pie! Yum, yum, yum! The best fish and chips every....the only place where I actually eat the mushy pees :) There's a really cool aussie band there, I think they are called the Maple Jacks, check them out. Every city has a drinking institution... Irish Village is Dubai's! Lively place to meet up with friends and generally enjoy the great vibes of the place. Always recommended! during the nice weather its really enjoyable to sit outside and listen to the live music Yesterday was amazing can't wait to go back.... Name: Blue Bar   Novotel World Trade Centre
Reviews: Dubai's one authentic jazz bar. Great fashionable decor, cigars and an unusually good selection of draught belgian beers, just make sure that when you go live music is scheduled Overrated. Wish the jazz was better Best shaken Margarita....in the world and I tried a lot of them.... Try sol beer with the happy hour offer Thursday nights a classic rock band plays that are great! Best margaritas in Dubai! The jazz is quite nice, but not the best. Make sure you catch the live music events! The margaritas are ok, but not exceptional and a little bit to small.  And I'm a mexican The dirty martinis however, are not just dirty, they're 4 olives dirty 4 Go on Thursday/Friday when they have live local jazz bands, not always the best acts but wicked music, small cosy and people are 'regulars' I love Blue Bar for the music and the atmosphere - great for midweek drinks. But be warned - on weekends it gets super busy and the music is very loud - don't expect a chilled night out! Lovely music Recommended on Thursday nights when a really good band is playing and it's always packed. Just love the jazz there ! Rock band masterly playing Pink Floyd.. I was amazed to find such a place in Dubai. Blue Bar at Novotel World Centre is celebrating 10 years of good times, and live music! Join us in the celebration, Thursday 10th October! For more information: http://on.fb.me/GJ0BAK

Name: Apr  s
Reviews: Try the thin crust pizza. Beer s good too It looks over Ski Dubai. This is what you get for AED 55/- Nice lounge with ski view. Very calm crowd. Nice deals for drinks w/ I think is buy 1 get 1 free for regular spirits.

Name: Barrels Sports Bar
Reviews: Pint of Warsteiner - AED 32. Heaven. Check out the jazz band that plays every night till January. Brilliant.... Great place. Good design and all football matches live on screen. Best 'Non Shady' Sports Bar in the Mankhool area. Ask for their beer deals and promotions. Carlsberg Pint - AED 23 The place is well lit and they have football playing on 3 TVs and MTV on 1! Free WiFi ‚Ä¶ Good soft tacos.. Freebies with drinks need to be better and more...,just peanuts!!!! awesome.offers. one of the best places to have a sip n enjoy the game Service is slow! I ordered a chicken and mushroom pie which took 35 mins to arrive! It was good, but by the time it arrived, I was late for an airport trip! Pretty darn good I must say! Fantastic chicken curry! Bummer today was a holiday of which prevented the sale of alcohol after 5:30!

Name: Duke s Bar
Reviews: Cosy Top floor bar @ hotel al khaleej with a nice 'creek' view. Free wifi and very cold carlsberg.

Name: Chill Rooftop Lounge
Reviews: Try the mint sheesha.... Awesome place n great atmosphere here..!! Good view from the roof :) I proposed  my girl here with a ring .for marriage . Wht did she say? Whr exactly is this place The shisha is good, the couches are comfy and it's on the rooftop. A really great place to unwind!

Name: Desert Safari Dubai
Reviews: the dubai desert safari is a very exciting experience.. well the belly dancer was awful though! Make sure you do this if you go to Dubai. . . unless you have a weak stomach for thrill rides. just enjoy the experience Sand boarding, dune bashing, bbq, sunset, camel riding and a lot more! going to the desert now!! Don't miss this on ur Dubai trip!! It's a great and thrilling experience!! Superb must go there ;) Authentic gifts in camp are made in china))) A must for everyone who is visiting UAE. A memory to share with your family & friends back home. This is one safari you cant do back home. I recommend it highly and it will be worth every penny spend! Excellent Desert Safari, This is the one and only must do thing in Dubai. best ever had time, mainly with my dear family The best experience! Don't miss the camel ride. The desert is lovely. Hot but definitely an amazing experience. Must do when you're in Dubai. If you ever plan a trip to Dubai, this is a must-do activity. No Dubai trip can be complete without it. The falcon show, sand dune driving and the camp food and belly-dancing experience is fantastic! Enjoy every part of desert safari. Enjoyable Belly dancing and do get a camel ride. (Go empty stomach) Tkt is cheaper if booked online. Evening safari has more activities than day-safari; longer hrs for "overnight". Dune bashing is OH-SOME! Get plenty of shawarma upon arriving at the campsite. Lami! ‚ò∫ Superb evening ...enjoyed belly dancing ....great dinner ....an awesome experience ...

Name: Sundowner Desert Safari
Reviews: You'll find people throwing up everywhere... Still it is a must do... Just look away and have a BLAST... Super fun

Name: Mushrif Park
Reviews: The Mushrif Equestrian Club is a good place to go horse-riding. They also play polocross there regularly. Great scenery for a morning or evening jog!!! I love Mushrif park, so peaceful and ust round the corner from Mirdif. Has a 5km cycling track as well! Good for cycling, if you want to make it difficult go anti clockwise. You can also go off road and practice your skills in the sand. Far from the uproar and the noise of the city, best place for barbecue grills with friends & family..... ÿ≠ÿØŸäŸÇÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ∑ŸÅŸàŸÑÿ© ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§ Lot's of picnic areas so don't forget your mat.. I just love this park.. If you are into photography (especially birding) visit during day time the park is full of birds of various types.. I love this park, ayaaam kinda old to me Good place for BBQ!

Name: Al Nasr Leisureland
Reviews: check in @ Viva Goa for a great Goan experience Clip this Cobone deal: Savour Friday Brunch at Fountain Restaurant, M√∂venpick Hotel and Apartments Bur Dubai for AED 130 (Value AED 260) - House beverages are included! ht.ly/9dbi8 Favourite Bowling spot!

Name: Talise Spa
Reviews: Order a ginger tea while relaxing after your treatment - the spicest I've ever had! :) Ample kind of heat I need. Body treatment is 100% soothing. They serve green tea and juices too. Experience Rejuvenation at the heart of Madinat Jumeirah. BB Pin 26290999 I love Talise Spa. After the Dubai Marathon I went there for Talise Signature to relive muscle pain. Now I feel realy good. I just finish a Talise Signature Massage... Indeed after running the Dubai Marathon! Talise sunrise yoga everyday 7am. Great way to start the day! You can use the facilities like shower and hair dryer to from there to work looking beautiful and feeling wonderful! Very disappointing. The signature treatment was not memorable. Did you know that Talise spa is serving by the pool our summer delights, book your treatment and enjoy a full day retreat and little treats by the pool11.30 am - Cold Towels/ Evian Spray 12.30 pm Talise Spa Madinat Jumeirah is offering an exclusive 35% Discount on selected Facials TreatmentsTalise Anti Aging Signature FacialTalise Deep Cleansing FacialTalise Deep Moisturizing Facial Wow!! Aromatherapy Associates with 40% discount! Only at Talise Spa! Paradise in the middle of Dubai)) outdoors and indoors pools, sauna, steam room. Very good service Try the human regenerator!! It is so relaxing and extraordinary! Yea the ginger tea everyone is going on about, Is fantastic! Especially after your treatment. Dont bother trying anything else. Aromatherapy massage + renewal facial = Perfect combination! One of the best spa in Dubai. Hight class service and only organic products. I'm impressed! Use a MasterCard and get a 90 min treatment for the price off a 60 min one. Or use Sirius too get a 15% discount with a silver card.

Name: Dubai Museum
Reviews: all history about dubai is here.. Great experience, a must visit in Dubai Great museum. Did not understand the dead birds suspended from the ceiling with fishing line Great place to learn all about the history of Dubai. Must visit this museum to know all about Dubai. Highlight of Dubai.....!! One of the best Value visits. $3 DHS gives u entry to the museum. Unique and ancient museum in Middle East A great museum covering the history of Dubai up to current times. Its cheap entry and convenient location make it unmissable. This is the only place you'll not find anything latest in display :-) Well worth the visit & much bigger than I expected! Entrance fee is only 3 dhs for adults. Closest metro station is Al Fahidi. Enjoy! :) Don't miss any stalls. Depiction of work if carpenters is awesome Need to know the History and Culture of United Arab Emirates? Then visit. A must visit place. Visited here on National Day 2012. 2nd Decemer 2012 Dubai  Museum Just take the abra near Baniyas Square Metro, then just a short walk you'll be here... Nice display of what was Dubai before and how it transformed.. Just that the video presentation is not up to date Non male. Simpatiche le ricostruzioni con figure a dimensioni reali. Reviews: Small space - Interesting selection by arab artists amazing!!!

Name: Ayyam Gallery
Reviews: Kais Salman pop art This gallery offers an impressive range of contemporary Middle Eastern art, especially from the vibrant Damascus art scene. The Elite of contemporary art among four walls ...

Name: Maharlika Cafe
Reviews: Soft drinks are very expensive, I ordered two and ended up paying AED 80!! They do hard rock covers but don't get them right! Amazing and very lovely atmosphere

Name: Marine s Club
Reviews: Listen to the vintage rock of the best band in the emirate. Cheap drinks. A bit dated interior. Be forewarned: PLENTY of "business ladies" . Band was good but not the best. Plus point was that they didn't try to do comedy routines between songs. The resident DJ plays the freshest tunes of happy house music Best Filipino rock band in Dubai! Still the best rock band in the GCC!

Name: Voodoo
Reviews: i wanna be there tonight..need someone to hang there with

Name: The     Club
Reviews: dum de da............................. Bit of a pretentious place to go clubbing... If you like that sort of thing! The music sucks at the begining but it gets better after 1:00 am... The customer service sucks big time. The music is ok, the prices acceptable, but I just hate the way the people at the entrance treat people. It's a big black point for "400". Customer service sucks! This place is a joke http://www.pingdubai.com/nightlife/club-400-dubai/ Love The 400 Nightclub Close to Cavalli being a real UNDERground club!! Well the location is already closed, it is not existing anymore Music's everything, resident DJ Nick Tohme, great sound system, LED walls/ceilings & amazing drinks served from a nice long bar just below stairs, what else can one ask for to turn night on full fire. It was my best night club at dubai  , too cowded , i love to have my owne VIP table couz u gonna have ur owen server , coz if u didnt u gonna have a bad servece

Name: Heritage   Diving Village
Reviews: Moroccan tea - A must try. Mild and refreshing. Loved this place! A lot of handicrafts made of shells and precious stones

Reviews: Must try chicken popcorn and frozen coke. loved transformers 3D so much Sign up for 'VOX Rewards'! For every 10 movies, you get 1 movie free! :) Must try frozen coke and chicken popcorn. If you get the ice slush ask for a longer straw Salt popcorn with butter sauce! Yummmy Someone needs to edit this... Its CINEMA, not CENIMA. Duh! Going for immortals will review later Very tidy and organized place in very well way Shit. Real and grand are better. VOX Cinemas! THE BEST MOVIE THEATRES EVER!! Smelly stinky carpet. >:[ The best theater food across all the cinemas in UAE . They need to check their air con. Had a stale smell in the hall Massage junkies! De-stress chairs are awesome! 2 minutes for just a dirham. One of the best cinemas in the UAE especially with the new vox plus FF6 simply amazing .... Great to watch movies for free... feel blessed! Name: Plaza Cinema
Reviews: Its very close to my home but I never went there, anyone want to go with me to watch the movie

Name: Dubai Autodrome
Reviews: Try the Kart drom! Outdoor is preferable but indoor is a laugh! Try the audi driving experience! One must do! beat the heat New BMW 335 is one of the best that I have driven .you guys got to try that . Track, Kart, Drag and AutoX its Dubai motorsports heaven An empty track and still needs a lot of work! amazing place to have a fun Every Wednesday from 6-9pm the Club Circuit opens for Cycling, Jogging, & Roller Blading under the flood lights. Everyone must have a helmet (except runners) The Autodrome in Motor City gets new Audis every year! Ask if you can drive one! Get a better deal if you drive with a group! Call 043678700 to schedule a race. Really hard to find the place for biking/skating/jogging on Wednesday night. Please put up more signs! Fasten your seatbelts and get ready for the ride of your life. Experience the thrill of burning rubber, speeding steel and roaring engines at the spectacular Dubai Autodrome. Visit the Dubai Autodrome this coming Friday (March 29) and witness exciting car & bike races. Attendance is free! Is it your dream to drive on a race-track? With Dubai Autodrome's "Car & Bike Track Days" at DUBAILAND, you can! Free evenings of cycling, jogging, rollerblading or walking! Join us every Wednesday at Dubai Autodrome at DUBAILAND for the "Revolution Nights"! Don't wear a white outfit when going to laserdrome and always wear dark colors.

Name: Dubai Community Theatre   Arts Centre
Reviews: For all art enthusiasts, the entrance to the Dubai Community Theatre and Arts Centre (DUCTAC) is located on Level 3 of MOE parking lot.

Name: Beach Centre
Reviews: Still serviving! those 2 craft shops are SO expensive Lots of memories in this place, way before the Downtown Burj, JBR, Palm Jumeirah.....etc This mall (center) brings soooo many memories!!!!!! Good place to buy crafts. Old is gold Boring mall but nice fish restaurant

Name: Bani Yas Square
Reviews: Good for coffee & gudgudaa

Name: Ski Dubai
Reviews: get into the big plastic ball that was fun ! Watch out for people who dont know how to ski and women with their face covered great fun! like real snow, and just as cold :( been living in dubai for 3 years but never been to ski dubai!  okay, now is the time i guess! coz itss freakin' hot! ski dubai will cool me down! If you're gonna ride the slopes bring a iPod to crack a few tunes on the way down! Features an 85-metre high indoor mountain with 5 slopes of varying steepness and difficulty, including the world's first indoor black run! Wrong location, this is in mall of the emirates not jebel ali! Ok, is not like skying on the mountain but it's the best thing we can have in Dubai. Anyway, be careful while skying. You might probably know to stand, but others don't. Enjoy it :) Endless fun & soooo much more than just skiing..... A must-see in Dubai! It has the feel of a real ski slope, in the middle of the desert. Make sure you bundle up, because it's just as cold as real snow. Look out for the children & those who can't ski. Amazing! Name: Dubai Internet City
Reviews: Take a walk around the lake. Either at 7 am as the sun rises or after 7pm after sun sets..in winter! :) In dubai internet city Building no 14, we have a good indian restaurant Right now in DIC 13 Nothing beats a morning coffee at Costa in DIC 3! Costa coffee with a view at building 3 The food court in the Building 3 is good with decent options with subway as my favourite. Also the food court in the Siemens building is nice. Sitting outside the lake is the best way to unwind. Name: Reel Cinemas
Reviews: Nicest cinema I've ever been to. Comfy seats, lots of room and very posh. Nice cinema, very comfortable seats. Also, you can get a blanket and a pillow for 10 extra dirhams. No commercials, woot! Popcorn tastes bad. Seats not comfy. Not worth the 50aed Can get too cold inside. When I said cold, I meant FREEZING. Bring a jacket/coat if you don't want to look like having a mild seizure while watching Angelina Jolie. love the platinum.. very relaxing and the cinema in general is so clean.. try their super extra cold sodas... :)) Great seats and the spicy popcorn is the bomb Tickets are 50dhs?? 3D movie tickets cost 65AED each. Best 3d cinema in Dubai Wonderful cinema It wasn't 3D cinema that day... They offer you blanket for a reason, if you don't want to buy one, you know what to do. Watch out you don't get a screaming baby! They didn't even do anything about it Friendly staff & some of the best seats a movie theater can have... By far the best cinema in Dubai. Worth every Dirham!! I thought it was comfie. No coffee allowed inside though. ÿ≠ŸÑŸàŸàŸàŸà ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÉÿßŸÜ More expensive than others cinema... Is it worth??? Definitely worth the premium price tag... A must watch movie "War Horse". Screens on the 26th of January! Too expensive ticket. Not worth the cost. Make sure you book your tickets or pick your online purchased tickets through their kiosks! Such a time saver! This movie theater is great! Definitely pay the extra 10 AED for a pillow and blanket. Totally worth it as the theater can get chilly. By far, the best cinema in Dubai. Only downside is the few number of screens but for an extra 15 dhm U get the best, most comfy, huge rclining seats and great sound system. Worth every Durham. No better way to take things off your mind then a trip to the novies Parker!!!!! I recommend. My favorite theater in dubai! Nice clean and amazing seats! It's really a nice cinema. Abit expensive compared to the reel cinema at Dubai Mall. The best movie theatre in Dubai, very comfortable seats and not so packed specially on weekdays. Make sure to check the website first since they don't show the same movies as Dubai Mall This is a nice theatre by US standards but for Dubai it's only average at best.  I'm a fan, minimal weekend crowds, reasonable refreshment prices, and comfortable seats... The best movie theatre in Dubai ;-) –†–∞—Å—Å–æ–º–∞—Ö–∞ –∫–ª–µ–≤—ã–π —Ñ–∏–ª—å–º Jobes.... Must be seen... Name: The Gardens

Name: CNN Building
Reviews: Parking tends to be a big issue, so if you are going here you are better off taking a cab If you'e coming to CNN building you'll hardly find any parking in front of it. Even paid ones are always full. Try the big free parking (rough area) next to the REUTERS building (on walking distance) Grab a bite on Ground floor or 2nd floor The Second floor of the CNN Building has this awesome arabic restaurant called Zyara. They have an awesome AED 40 buffet(including a soft drink). Try their Hummus...its very nice. I'd say best in DXB. The steak salad or the pumpkin salad at Circle!! Yummm!! Well if you are a soup fan like me, you should try the "Lentil soup" from Circle .. But with a dash of lemon juice .. This building has a restaurant on the lake front. Grab yourself a gorgeous black beauty smoothie from Circle - its low fat! Loy of people have lack of vitamin d as per doctors.        This place is nice go take a walk in the sun in morning 8-9 and gain D. You won't loose money ;) Poor people work even on holidays and late night

Name: Trader Vic s
Reviews: tikiiii pukaaa pukaaaaa.... !!! Haven't been to trader vic's without having a tiki puka puka if you are not ordering tiki pucka puckas then y are you there great food! great band! great drinks! The Indonesian rack of lamb is killer. A must. Try Seared Tuna. Heaven Fe3lan tiki pukaa pukaaaa... Laiden with alcohol and served in a wide cocktail mug :)) Tika Puka Puka!! Tiki Pukaaaaaaaaaaa - it's great, try it!! Filipino waiters kiss White asses. Less hope for people with colored skin. Tika Puka Puka TIKA PUKA PUKA!! - You HAVE to have one If there's one thing or rather drink you should have here is Tiki Puka Puka nice vibe! singapore symphonnnnyyy! You must try mai-tai!!! If you are looking for latin live music & salsa dancing, Trader Vics is the place. Try the appetizer's while enjoying the greatest cocktail Tikapukapuka Tiki puka puka - 151% proof!! Tiki puka puka... Try it Write a foursquare tip about having a tiki pukka pukka Just eat rib-eye. You will not regret;) If you are coming for dinner, try their Seared Tuna among their Trader Vics Traditions menu. Overtly crowded on Thursday and Friday nights. It's okay but always packed ... Have the curry. You can thank me later. The chicken skewers we got were raw! Watch out. Wanna get in to the mood in one drink? Try the drink 'Titanic' (not there in the menu). Ask the attender. cool on thursday and friday nights cool place and realy crowded on wednesday, thursday and friday. high heels and short skirts included... Must try: Seared Tuna; & a tiki puka puka after that on the bar on the beats of Trader's live latino band. My new personel favorite in dubai.. Get high on Hawain music.. Oysters and Seared Salmon are to die for! Coming to trader vics via abra is much more fun than car, far more romantic The view from abra Ôòç Fillet of beef with mustard sauce Singapore sling, peach tree punch, tiki puka puka.. Tiki Puka Puka.. Tiki puka puka 4everrr !! Delicious food. Excellent cocktails. Amazing atmosphere. Go for the Tika Puka Puka - a 4-drink barrel of liquor to start your night off right! Love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Drink tika puka Rocks:) but take it slow ... Tika Puka Puka Try Virgin coral reef drink .. It's amazing It's a nice place lunch Nice location, but the service needs improvement. Very slow. Happy hour 6-8pm Saturdays... All tables are reserved for late bookings so a bit annoying, but you can grab a table up to 6.30pm for quick drinks.. Make sure u're there early! Last order is at 1:15! Curries are to die for G√ºzel mekan‚ò∫ Amazing collection of cocktails and each one better than the previous. I wish i could taste all. Definitely don't ask for a classic drink like a martini. Lovely spot!!! Merengue salsa... Too much overrated in terms of taste, you pay for the ambiance Avoid this place. The order never arrived. 50 min later we asked 4 the manager. Arrogant, tipsy, not focusing in a hurry. We cancelled order and he didn't care. Zero Customer service. Zero management Can get very crowded on weekends. Horribly expensive cocktails. Good music and ambience. Don't think much about what you'll drink, just have Singapore Symphony! üíõ If you haven't tried the Tiki Puka Puka here you most definitely are missing out Amazing like everytime...nice music...good drinks...nice atmosphere..a must see place in Dubai! Name: Grand Cinemas
Reviews: See if you can spot City of Life's limited edition poster designed by Xische at the cinema this week! Death at a funeral is funny Good movie & enjoy! Late night movie date with Rex. Watching Due Date. Apply for Ibn Battuta's Tuesday Card. Every tuesday you get two movie tickets for the price of one! Also 20%off on some shops and restaurants! Get your Popcorn & Pepsi, book your ticket right in the middle; rest assured that you are gonna have a blast of time...!!! Coke+popcorn + maltesers=:) The IMAX is great. The 3D is good. If you really wanna have fun, buy tickets for 3 movies in the same day. Once one is over, check in for the other one. This is the place for movie addicts :) Great theatre with some of the hottest movies!!! N great environment!! Watched the Dark Knight here, it was the best movie experience I've ever had! Name: Jabel Ali Free Zone
Reviews: Nice jebaali free zone

Name: Al Wasl area
Reviews: Quiet and lovely area. If you're after food check out Eat & Drink, Al Reef Lebanese Bakery and the several restaurants and cafes at Al Wasl Square. Run around Safa Park to burn off those calories :-P

Name: Brewster s
Reviews: American breakfast is great value at AED27 including eggs, hash brown, toast, fruit juice, fresh fruit pieces and choice of tea or coffee Not the best place for dinner. The wings are terrible, the portions are too little and the prices are high for the quality. Would never come back again. love the fish burger!! yea the place to be any time..... Though not cheap, but love the food. Great selection of food ... Their Moroccan Chicken is well seasoned ... And the Onion Mushroom Burger is big and juicy! Just like how I like it :) Used to like this place but now they seem to change if they're gonna serve alcohol or not on a nightly basis. Understand during Ramadan but not during Eid. Everywhere else in Madinat is serving booze. Great food .Crown of shrimps is a must .You can also refresh ur meal with cocktails .

Name: Trader Vic s
Reviews: The jalape√±o cheeseballs and mini burgers are excellent. Love them tika pukas!! Favourite hotspot.. :) Try Singapore's symphony -the best cocktail here Service with a smile! Service with a grimace !!! Don't have PukaPuka on a work night!!! Here for the peach tree punch. :) Try the Scorpion Bowl, too. üëç √áok sert i√ßki arayanlara gelsin: titanic Tiki puka puka strong !!

Name: Apr  s

Great rib eye steak...great option to escape from wife while she shops you go for a beer Pizza diavola. It's Apr√®s not Apr√©s:) Try the smoked salmon crab cake. Great wine! And the tapas sharer is great! Music is brilliant! Lovely place Sundays free sparkling wine for the ladies (3 rounds) Nice after 10 pm Orbis Fresh Roasted Coffee is served here! Fancy a cig with ur drink? Here's the place to be! Free Internet connection! Enjoy! Smoked salmon its amazing always order same. Nice lunch combos tho. Sundays ladies nights!!! Fantastic ski dubai view, great food, alcoholic beverages served and smoking permitted. Steak & wine! :) Watchmen your bill if you take fondue. They charge extra 5AED each time you ask for more bread. Hard to catch the cheese without bread... Nice getaway from the busy mall with coldest beer and DJ on the decks... Name: Dubai Silicon Oasis
Reviews: Never miss to attend Dubai Tech Night there! Take part in the Investing in Technology Forum Very close to every important area in Dubai City YET far from all the noise, traffic & chaos of Dubai's Centre Life!! http://maps.gstatic.com/intl/en_ALL/mapfiles/markerTransparent.png kost-kost an Good place to live! affordable apartments and a growing area. Away from the city noise, yet 15 mins away from Shiekh Zayed Road Don't be fooled by the cool name of this area.. It's actually in the middle of a desert. YES A DESERT. Obviously this is not Silicon Valley in States but for suburban living it is a good place. There are many houses and flats, several schools, universities nearby and of course Spinneys and a BIG one! An also nurseries. All in all a food place if you have a family, otherwise there are many other exciting places in Dubai  like downtown or jumeirah. If you get house in spring bludgeon you are lucky The dso hq building is nice one, with good and wide access via emirates road. Ideal location for my office. And now there are many restaurants around dso. It's still a pretty cool place to live Eassy Access

Name: Arabian Ranches Golf Club
Reviews: Besides being able to play some great golf at ARGC, the food in the restaurant is also excellent.The beef filet, tiger prawns, and green curry dishes are my favorites. Enjoy them on the terrace when The restaurant has a nice terrace overlooking the golf course, great for an evening dinner & drinks Try the BBQ ribs Try the penne pasta with saut√©ed chicken it's delicious! Fabulous Eggs Benedict and the Mahjong ladies on a Monday are fun!! Worst golf course ever Baby pork ribs, the best option in the menu!!!! Watch out for wind in this open golf course with tons of loose sand Arabian Ranches Golf Club has a short Par 3 attached to the Academy and driving range. Find out more about Arabian Ranches Golf Club on UAE Golf Online - http://www.uae-golf-online.com

Name: Arabian Ranches
Reviews: Arabian Ranches Golf Club.... The best terrace restaurant in town.. Dubai Arabian Ranches are located only a few minutes from the juncture of three key ring roads which are leading to Abu Dhabi, Al Ain and Dubai. Great weekend escape - Riding, camel polo and BBQ. nice project by Emaar! visit The Nail Spa in Arabian Ranches and pamper yourself! Calm and confortable liveable place

Name: The Global Village
Reviews: Syrian Pavilion's the best around! most of the ATMs don't work or out of cash. THAI crews is da best! Thailand Pavilion always crowded Palestine got sa7lab:-) you should have visited me in islamic pavillion :P srry im away now :) but do visit huh!? Try out Al haaj bundoo khan's kebab n paratha, it's really cool.. Spice n taste of Pakistan Check the bike riders. Behind the food courts. Amazing performance!Worth a watch Check emarati village.  Nice stuff Too crowded. It's crazy on Emirates Rd. during the weekend at the GV entrance. But inside is nice, you can get a taste of some other countries without actually leaving UAE :) and the fun park is...fun the "booza" (Icecream) at the Palestinian village is a MUST! wnoderfull place to spend nice tym,,,,wr coming this weekend hayyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy try indian food India sucks this tym..... Don't miss the Khalifat Zayed show Nice place specially for families good entertainment shows from all over the world Go early ... Around 4:30 pm - 5 pm ... No crowd and great opportunity to shop peacefully! Ewwwwe lol DWC VILLAGE 20-24 DEC! Don't miss it!! Where is the omani village Sea food tom yum soup at the Thailanf pavilion is the best.. Very excited. I found a very nice water filter shop in UAE pavalion. I purchased a shower for reduce hair falling and its amazing. Nice,Place,ESP Indian pavillion Don't forget to visit the Art Nation show (25-28Jan) at the events tent (Close to the VIP Parking area ) Best Watermelon Smoothie Everrrrr in Jordan and Dubai <3 Try Thai food in Thai Pavillion is da best i like it so much They make the best karak @ the sri lankan pavilion. The best orange juice @ the Tunisian pavilion & they have KDD softie :') Waste of Time & Money ... Try the Turkish food. Really finnger licking good. So crowded, hard to find a parking place. Saturday is the last day :(, don't miss the Falafel in the Palestinian pavilion! Pomegranate Juice - Jordan - Great!! Now days visiting GV is wonderful experience, its not much crowded After Istanbul, I like here, calm and relaxed :) The Mayor has never even been here! : D lol! With my Husband... With my Wife... The Global Village - one of the places we recommend all our guests to visit while traveling in Dubai. So much fun for families with kids. Let's spend all our money on kachra machra, shall we? Do forget to take a picture for your parking NO, Or you will spend at least  a hour to reach your car. I've been there once and I really had big time of fun ... Name: KidZania
Reviews: This place is the childhood memory of all adults. Bravely leave your kid behind for a couple of hours and go shopping! This place is the childhood memory of all adults. Bravely leave your kid behind for a couple of hours and go shopping! Try the du contact centre thats about to open in a few days :) A grownup world designed for kids. Creative play, great for developmental skills.  Not advisable for children below 4 or 5 even, they may not understand the concept of work and getting a job. Un concept original et un paradis pour les enfants ! Rent a jail for your kids = peace Abd quite.

Name: Dubai Polo   Equestrian Club
Reviews: Don't go to the Epona Lounge for dinner. We were very disappointed. The quality of the food is not good, the salad not fresh and tasteless.The Polo & Equestrian Club has a second restaurant, the Pal

Name: Caravan Restaurant
Reviews: Great chicken biryani Very nice buffet for 55 Dhs loved the variety The best Thai soup...! and great collection of item in buffet...

Name: The Jam Jar
Reviews: Awesome art gallery in Al Qouz. Regular exhibitions and painting for the masses. Al you need to bring is your creativity! Follow them on @thejamjar to keep up to date on what's happening.. Lovely art space. If you use the CareZone iPhone app when you're there, thejamjar gives you credit for your next visit & Coins you can donate to charity! Download CareZone now :) Get your painting fix here, let the creativity flow! Amazing !!

Name: Zeta
Reviews: Genial @ zeta try the fountain roll. Tempura shrimp and wagyu beef maki roll. Its smooth. The onion rings are to die for! Passion fruit ice tea is also amazing! They now have a straight through licence, so alcohol is served between 4pm and 6pm Great view of the fountains. Make sure you go past the bar and down the couple of steps.  Fountain roll is the best! The club sandwich is yameeeee Great view but unfortunately they are doing construction on the fountain that it ruin the view on burj kalifa!

Name: Media One Hotel
Reviews: The burgers are amazing! The lobby restaurant downstairs serves a mean sandwich Sun-thurs cheese and wine at 7pm 150dhs/person While internet access in a hotel is a must, I've found it to be pretty expensive in the Middle East. Luckily, it's free in the lobby. All tweeps working in TECOM get 20% discount in all food and beverages in all outlets! Internet free... Great... Elevators are tricky... Inconvenient A new hotel option and meeting place in media city The burger at Cafe M is magnifico.. i did and the place was awesome! No wifi in the room, only cabled access :( Music from the bar gets pretty loud on Thursday and Friday nights and ends only at midnight so stay out till then if you're not a party animal. Small but very tastefully decorated rooms with all the comforts of a modern, 4 star hotel. Very good gym facilities and friendly staff. Free Internet at the lobby, cool! Internet free on 8th floor too Nice pool in the middle of media city Media Mondays No vallet service here! Where the buzz is in...! If you own a car don't get near this hotel! The pool party is really annoying, you can not sleep before they turn the music off, at midnight! Not recommended Brilliant place for business meetings. Great hotel, did not disappoint. Music does get loud at weekends tho. We were on 18th floor and could still hear it. Luckily we were up early for our flight. Still, doesn't put me off staying again. Free wifi log in on mediaone Killer roof top pool - very standard downtown LA The cafeM in this hotel is a wonderful European cafe where you can lounge in. The snacks are fantastic here as well. Don't stay here if you want a good night sleep.. Loud music till past 3 am last night Brilliant hotel but parking a pain. Guess we're spoilt with valet parking in Dubai. A place with value for money. Very friendly valet service! If going for Iftar,I highly recommend the middle eastern drink JALLAB. Best salad would be Apple coleslaw. Very polite valet service... Ask the bill when you have finished ordering. the Caf√© makes a good Caesar salad. The nearest metro station is just a few minutes' walk away from the hotel. Great Cheese&Wine night on Tuesdays- 150AED and nice atmosphere! Menu. $$$$ La terraza estupenda! They've revamped the pool deck area- great for parties & functions! Martha and the Chef saved our Christmas lunch with last minute turkeys- amazing gravy and wonderful cranberry sauce! Very polite and friendly staff. Got an early check-in with an upgrade, for FREE. Another hotel worth checking out.. Club Mina at Le Meridien is walking distance. Nice place to spend the day at the beach. The Bento Box is a smart way to do a business lunch .. super liked today !! Great for work/business stays in Dubai if you want to be near by the tech company offices. CAF√â M - PARKING/COFFEE/CROISANT - 07:00 - 10:30 - AED 35 I loved the hotel ... Clean & Friendly Staff & not far from town ... recomended .. At the pool, in the parking.. They just surprise u with new ideas!

Name: UPTOWN MotorCity
Reviews: Everybody seems to be out of luck to find parking at local Spinneys. Please try underground parking - lots of space, lift takes you next to the mall entrance. No queues, no time wasting Parking is very inconvenient for a huge supermarket like spinneys. Otherwise this is the best community around dubai. Cant avoid the most annoying road bumps ever! What where they thinking?? Walk, if the weathet is nice and avoid those road bumps ServeU, level of services is really bad especially plumping services Parking is kaaak Great community to live in, just few minutes walk to Spinneys and many good restaurants. Very green and lots of swimming pools. Nice quiet community. If you're around Beaufort Pool House (behind Dickens Circus 2 - Gate 3) join the Aqua Zumba  party taking place every Tuesday morning at 10 am at for the best workout at Motor City! ;) The best community in dubai. Great place for families. Best community in Dubai! Quiet, green and accessible. Prices are goin up in a crazy way.... Two bedroom is 105000aed!!! WTH Every Tuesday at 10AM, the Motor City ladies meet at CARIBOU COFFEE for a fun morning chat. This gathering's open to all, join us! ;) More info at http://www.facebook.com/DubaiMotorCity

Name: Belgium Beer Cafe
Reviews: Order the tasting tray, Loads of fun and varieties of beers to taste. Yum!

Name: Dubai Aquarium

No need for the boat ride Must come and see the rare fishes and visit the tunnel and the underwater zoo. Don't stand by the rope. Stand further back, its a more impressive view Do experience Night Safari at Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo. One of the coolest things in Dubai. Reviews: 10Th April 2012- Jack Canfield will be speaking Live in Ductac, for more information visit http://rightselection.com/jackcanfield/ Park on the roof, its right opposite DUCTAC. It's amazing place to see live shows!!! Live it

Name: Jebel Ali Karting Track
Reviews: Just come by with your friends and start racing. It's fun and enjoyable. Be careful when you leave. When your at the wheel inside the car, remember that karting time is over.

Name: Mirador La Collecion
Reviews: You're better off getting home delivery food from Motor City than the Ranches

Name: Elegante Club
Reviews: Desi Nites are amazing here... DJ Shadow and DJ Hani keep you on your toes all through the night.... The staff is friendly and the place rocks it Royally Dubai Style.... !!!! Unless you are into R&B, Hip Hop or Desi you can give Elegante a skip. Loads of other clubs in Dubai that you could rather go to. AKS, Dubai's Most Happening "DESI" Night is now Here. AKS, Dubai most popular "Desi" Night is now Here It's a club where they don't have daikiri frozen, mojito, and the pinacoldada sucks...if ur beer drinkers go there, otherwise choose somewhere else... Remembering the old days Amazing disc for rnb and indian songs remix.

Name: The Toy Store
Reviews: Good store, but avoid in the heat of the summer. The air conditioning just isn't sufficient which turns it into a sauna Check out the cafe area at the back of the store.  Please contact me if you want the toy store to organize a super bday party for you!! There is a free gift wrapping service. :) An excellent selection of the best kids toys for all ages for indoor and outdoor use üëç

Name: DBC Dubai Bowling Center
Reviews: took a bunch of office peeps along after 6. Great Fun. Book individual lines at AED100 per hour, grab two if you can, pull in all your guys. Much better than picking individual games.

Reviews: Home Sweet Home.... don't visit the Medina Super Market there... U have got to try the "Sexy paan" flavour !!! Name: Ice Rink
Reviews: Noodle factory... Sweet and Sour chicken... A must have... Damn full of kids! If you're a pro, don't go there on the weekends. Ice skating is soo much fun here! Dubai has it all :-) You could never get bored in this city Dont come at a weekend, its full and the ice melts fast Forget this place.. Way overcrowded. Go to Al Nasr Leisureland! Eid Mubarak :) Guard the inner sides of your feet well to avoid severe rashes! Wear double socks Better bring a jacket.. so freaking cold :$ If you near come to NB in Mirkato They breakat 16:00, so if. You wanna start, make sure u come b4 that! to list this venue as outdoor ... iLike ;) They have great classes for kids who don't know how to skate, and good packages for one parent + one child. Name: Madinat Arena
Reviews: a wonderful venue for the Dubai Film festival Great venue for a team meeting in dubai..

Name: Dome Cafe
Reviews: They have Nasi Lemak here!! The chicken chasseur is highly recommended

Name: Pavilion Sports Club
Reviews: Exclusive , expensive but worth it ! For Membership to Talise at Jumeirah Beach Hotel please contact me...will.robb@jumeirah.com

Name: Fibber Magee s
Reviews: Try the quiz nights.... Funny as! Bacon Bap @ AED 15 is pretty awesome. Make sure to enquire about offers as they have something going on almost all the time. Also the place to be if you are a Chelsea FC fan. Awesome pub quiz and free 4 drinks for ladies on tuesdays! Located in the same building as noor islamic bank on shk zayed. Just go to the back of the building and you should see it. Mondaymadness 150 Dhs free Eat and Drink Quiz night..... Wow! Best lunch deal in town, any main course (real portions) and a pint for 55aed Awesome crowd! Try the chicken stuffed its really good we almost lick our plates! Haha The managers does not know how to handle customer!! U need more trainings! Very rude and arrogant! Beat your beer - 18 & 20 dirhams a pint! Now that's proper Irish hospitality English breakfast Most authentic pub in Dubai!  :-) Great place for a proper breakfast. Beautiful atmosphere. Nice service as per Irish pub std. Best place to hang out.... Great drink deals during ramadan. Happy hour from 8 - 10 pm. It's a very nice pub and they have bacon for breakfast!

Name: The Montgomerie Golf Club
Reviews: The Nasi Goreng at the Academy is excellent. You should try it. Eat inside, the flies are relentless! try the steak sandwich! Its very juicy;) For landscape contact TerraVerde LLC For Landscape contact TerraVerde LLC Carrot cake.. Watch out for the birds... Starting on hole 14th, they are steeling the food and scorecards from the buggy... Chilled out.. Drinks.. Golf.. Outdoors.. Enough said. The Address Montgomerie Dubai has a short Par 3 attached to the Academy and driving range. Find out more about the Address Montgomerie Golf Club on UAE Golf Online - http://www.uae-golf-online.com

Name: Springs
Reviews: No swimming pool in springs 10, but u can use the one at springs 11

Name: Al Boom Diving Club
Reviews: The place to go for all your diving needs in Dubai. They also have a new training center in Atlantis Hotel that's amazing for confined water dives as well. Friendly and competent scuba diving club team

Name: Emirates Golf Club
Reviews: Cooked breakfast and Tuesday Jazz night + they sell Erdinger!! Playing the Par 3 with Entertainer vouchers. Buy 1 get 1 free!!! Try the newly renovated M restaurant! Sat at 6th green fantastic day great ladies golf to warch becky morgan doing well Cool shooting range for some time wasting during the week Opt for the salad buffet.  It includes a decent salad selection and dessert for a fair price. Ramadan update: Alcohol will be served only after 8pm. Great place for some good food, a round of golf and swim!! Best golf course in dubai! Emirates Golf Club Par 3 is an excellent place to improve your short game on a full size par 3 Find out more about Emirates Golf Club on UAE Golf Online - http://www.uae-golf-online.com Highly recommend a facial or massage at the Sensasia spa! Best lobster Thermidor and burrata in town at the Le classique restaurant!

Name: Belgian Beer Cafe
Reviews: Great selection of beers try the kwak beer, four of this will guarantee you to face the floor ;) I'm with Iyad on this.  Kwak is a innocent tasting lethality. Great atmopshere and good selection of beers.  However the food is better at the Festival City Branch Best fries ever! Belgian fries with mayonnaise and a Leffe Blobd Best Belgian brewery! Give it up for Hoegaarden! Along with the French Fries u'r good to go! Leffe blanc and fries all the way Laffe bruin Try their Mussels and fries Hoegarden & mussels best combo leffe blonde! Beautiful place. third floor is outdoors! Fries are addictive, which is just as well as the rest of the food is poor. A bit girly but I do love the cherry beer along with the leffe blonde. A tip from a Belgian; try the Leffe Blond and Kwak with bitterballen, cheese croquettes and carbonnade There is no need to try any fruit based beer unless you want to drink mineral water with fruit taste Have the 1 pot of mussels with white wine. Leffe blonde is a must try Great night out the burger sucks, don't go for that. stick to the fries Took 45min on the steak to arrive Because of a full restaurant and definitely worth the wait!! Hats off to the chef on a job greatly done! Beer bar! & specialty in Thai Mussels! Have all sort of beer here! My recommendation is Leffe Brune! Don't listen to them! Mussles, beef stew, croquettes all great. Belgians not known for their burgers! Definetely duvel..leffe blonde second and kwak for the shape of it to have a good laugh.. Belgium Fries a must great mussel's pot (blue cheese) and the awesome chocolate mousse ever O_O Have the feeling there's a new chef or management. Improvement when it comes to the food & terrace. The food is good! Don't overdo it! If you're dining, make sure you try the Duck Confit! Tender and melts away at the touch. Awesome fries:) Music has definitely improved :) Hidden gem. Try the Hoegarden which is rare in Dubai. (3 of 4 petals via Fondu) The Duck for main course is divine! Nevermind that Belgian beers aren't my favourite, I love the outdoor area in this bar. Try their nature mussels. Amazing! Great selections of beer too! The Belgian Beer Cafes has got some of the nicest beer in town - you can go there for a whole week & still not be able to try each one. Food is good as well, go for the mussel pot or Belgian sausages. Meatballs, veal chops and Belgium fries...all delicious. Caffee latte is good! Leffe Brune must try wifi: 0987667890 Delicious fries and mussels...too bad they don't have chimay though :-( Great beer selection and a very nice place to catch a football match! Surprised by the good mussels they serve especially the Thai sauce and the mouthwatering Belgian fries! Happy hours from 3:30 - 7:00 everyday ! I'd like to fancy myself a beer enthusiast ;) and Beligian Beer Cafe meets my highest expectations!! They offer a wide selection of beer that exceeds over 100. By far my favorite place to get beer! Steamed Mussels is a musst! And a large helping of Warsteiner. Cheers!!!! Wifi password: 0987667890 Just enjoy some beer ;¬£! Leave a tip? Hahaha, so funny! Ok, maybe not soOo funny :P Compared to Belgian beer cafe in Abu Dhabi or Madinat Jumeirah you only get half a portion of mussel & the lamb chops are very small too. Service is also just average.Wouldn't come back to this outlet Try kriek beer . Cannot describe cheery flavor in a beer . Tasty French fries with cheddar  are a must-have at this place Beer is soooo good... Beers all the way! Great Place & Food ComedyNight 14th March! Amazing Belgian cheesy fries! Just can't get enough of those!!! Name: Bur Dubai Corniche
Reviews: Good Place to be... Come in evenings...

Name: Radisson Blu Residence  Dubai Marina
Reviews: I like it. Waay better than MHA. Nice buffet, bigger pools and more efficient staff. Excellent value for money. Nicely located. Excellent Studio Suite! Metro to the old city and gold souk. Just 5 minutes walk to the seaside boulevard and Hilton bar and the free beach. Take a sunset swim! Great staff, like always with Radisson Very comfy place for a business meeting! Nice place to stay. Clean, great area. I do recommend :) PS: View from the room. Very friendly staff Nice place to stay, great, clean, the staff is friendly and near to the beach, to movie theatre and to the metro station. Nice hotel if you have course or seminar Amazing location for JBR, Marina Mall and the Marina Walk. I would recommend a Marina view room. Check out the website and listen to Radio 2. A chance to win a trip to Turkey. You'll enjoy authentic Thai food here for breakfast. Very nice place, good location and Friendly staff. Good gym and pool area, but note that the sun is only shining until around 1pm until the building covers the light. Breakfast is ok. Great rooms...great view...great staff... :) Excelent 2 bedroom apartment & value! Highly recommended!

Name: The Hub Irish Bar at Sofitel Dubai
Reviews: Get here early for the big evening matches as it gets heaving. Early matches normally nice and quiet. in spite the place is Irish, give Heiniken Extra Cold a chance. you won't regret :) Chelsea won the Europa league here :-) This special is fake –ß–µ–∫–∏–Ω –¥–∞—ë—Ç –Ω–µ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∫–æ–∫—Ç–µ–π–ª—å, –Ω–æ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å –∏ –ø–∏–≤–æ!

Name: Al Maha Desert Resort   Spa
Reviews: Have a massage. Ask for a deep tissue with the thai girl. She is the most amazing therapist I had. Ever. Trust me. I do 5 hrs of massage a week. Tried them all in Dubai ;-) Order the Burger, it doesn't need any Secret Sauce! Had an amazing time, 2 nights needed to feel like your getting enough chill time though oh and make sure to upgrade the steak Wie bei uns sind 20 Grad und fallend The resort seemed to blend into nature, taking full advantage of its amazing surroundings. The food is wonderful with three excellent meals served per day. Also, daily activities should not be missed. Amazing convesration reserve. You have to eat at Al Diwaan Chef David Miras is amazing! Try one of our experiences here as well from www.limeandtonic.ae - http://bit.ly/PemI37 or  http://bit.ly/P1gim6 Amazing convesration reserve. You have to eat at Al Diwaan Chef David Miras is amazing! Try one of our experiences here as well from www.limeandtonic.ae - http://bit.ly/PemI37 or  http://bit.ly/P1gim6 Breathtaking and fabulous!  Impeccable!! Beautiful custom-made furniture ‚ù§ I was very impressed by the villas in this resort - each one with own pool! ‚ú®New on the blog‚ú® Site visit and lunch at Al Maha Resort, Dubai ‚ú® www.flaneriefeminine.com Loved this coffee set in the lobby ‚ù§ Best place to stay in UAE, if u wanna forget about all the s;&t in your life, that's the place, food is good, rooms are perfect and staff are awesome Comfortable hotel and resort. Exclusive bedouin tents in your private oasis. An amazing taste of the desert wild life. Highly recommended!

Name: Al Wasl Stadium
Reviews: I am now with my go to stadium watch soccer uea  vs oman tonight Favourite Club <3

Name: Arabian Ranches   Al Mahra
Reviews: Watch out for the mayor with two chicks by his side...

Name: Jules Bar
Reviews: :-) tonight one of the best ;) It's fun seeing senior citizens dancing to lady gaga and rihanna's beat. Cool!!! The best bullfrog in town! Very bad quality of sound coming from speakers... That's boring. Lovely ambiance. Best bullfrog in town Crispy pata and sotanghon! I love the bad! They are so funny! Pretty good food and the band is not half bad, if only the same could be said about the crowd. Enter after 22:00 at your own risk. One of the oldest Filipino bars in Dubai. Still offers best value for money and great entertainment.  (FACE club card holders ask for you discount!) Great service by the whole group, thanks The place offers 20% discount on food and beverage if you check-in on Foursquare. Discount can only be claimed if you're the Mayor. BOO! one of the best spot in Dubai... :) Cool place in town.. This place is awesome :) Band is pretty good Love the atmosphere here. ‚ô•

Name: Chef Lanka
Reviews: There is no end to spicy stuff here. Burn your tongue. Fried rice + kangkung +crispy cuttle fish are goooooood Great lankan food Try the Yellow Rice which comes with brinjal, choice of chicken or beef curry, egg and fish curry. Yummy! Of course my all time favourite is Lump Rice! Best beef red chilly dish but very hot

Name: Cuadro Art Gallery
Reviews: One of Dubai's top art destinations Beautiful art! Amazing art !!!

Name: The Underground
Reviews: Bar food great and the service best in Dubai. Great for sports as well Great real english food or as we like to call it (pub grub) Fucked up service during games... This is my 'local', step one foot inside and you're back in London (except for the prices). Decent food, sprawling screens everywhere, pretty good to come and visit have a pint and watch the footy¬† Well... the place is actually nice....holding a billiard Table..... staff....mmmmm  not so friendly at least afternoon staff.... The have a nice happy hour and the best...Pork...on the menu!!!!!!!!! Good location to watch football games in Dubai... a real sports bar! A great place to hang out at for pool players! Nice place to chill out.. :) A nice place to watch football games. Try to book a booth, you'll get to choose what game to watch on a big screen. Food is ok for pub...good location for quick beer Quiz nights every Wednesday!

Reviews: My home sweet home...

Name: St  Mina Coptic Orthodox Church
Reviews: Liturgy timings: Friday 7:30 am to 10:30 am, Saturday 7:30am to 10:30 am, Sunday 5:30 am to 7:30 am, Tuesday 7:30 PM to 10:30 pm. These r the regular weekly liturgy timings. For those interested to learn more about the Coptic Orthodox Church, pls join us at The Good Shepherd meeting every Saturday at 10:30 am. It is conducted in English and lasts 30 mins. Church Club timings sunday,tuesday,thursday from 7:30pm till 10:00pm, friday after sunday school till 5/6pm

Name: Green Community  West

Name: St  Marys Catholic Church
Reviews: Sunday masses are at 6, 6:45, & 9 AM and 4:30, 6, & 7:30 PM. I recommend hearing mass celebrated by parish priest Fr. Tom Veneracion (usually the 7:30 PM one) for his funny yet meaningful homilies. Friends of Bill W meeting every Friday at 10 am JOC Dubai meetings For Arabic Speaking Christian Youth, every Thursday at 8pm in Arabic Parish Hall pray pray :) Family Fest going on. Lots of Filipino, Chinese and Goan food to choose from. Tagalog mass every friday at 1230pm. 6am mass is the best Filipino Mass every Friday @ 12:30PM by Parish Priest Fr. Tom Veneracion JOC Dubai meetings for Arabic Speaking Christian Youth, every Thursday at 8pm in Arabic Parish Hall Its nice to attend sunday mass 7:30 - 8:30 in the evening with father Tom' sermon.. Get on ur knees once in a while and feed ur soul. Pray and Pray :) Take the metro to church, the station is around 200 meters away, you can then concentrate on praying rather than asking the lord to find a parking! The new Grotto was inaugurated on WED Pray pray pray Time to feed my soul Saint Mary's Church Moment with God Saturday mass is available too... For those who can't come on a Sunday. Obligatory mass is at 7:30pm. Suggest you come early if you're comig by car because parking ain't too easy. The earlier the better! Get a good place and time to park plus a seat inside the Church :) Will attend Holy Mass. Come early to get parking & a seat inside the church Day3  evening mass till Christmas day! Day6 evening mass ang sayasaya!‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§ Fridate with God <3 arabic mass every Friday 11.30am and 8pm.. 7:30 mass with Fr. Tom will keep you awake all throughout his homily. He's got a lot of long stories made short to tell every Sunday hehehe- very inspiring. üôè‚õ™ The Filipino mass is every Friday at 12:30pm.

Reviews: If the lifts take too long. Don't hesitate to go down first than up. The lifts sometimes skip the ground floor. A premiere digital media with nice offices in Dubai. Www.yahoo.com Merry Christmas All!! Knock Knock, Who's there? Ya! Ya who? Yahoo.com üòÅ

Name: Al Badia Golf Club by InterContinental Dubai Festival City
Reviews: Try Diwan, a beautiful terrace looking over the golf course, for shisha and Arabic tappas. You must try at sunset for that gorgeous skyline view. most challenging course in Dubai. Love the skyline on the 18th. Must try their steakhouse Terra Firma What amazing place.Relax Time. Blades Cafe' is a blast, liked their tea with mint Try the Nachos without the beef chilli sauce as a vegetarian option Try the cheese cake it's worth it Come here and try the chocolate cake yummy!!! "An Oasis themed golf course designed by the world renowned Robert Trent Jones II. Hotel guests receive preferential rates, so please contact the concierge for a tee time." Bring your A game Find out more about Al Badia Golf Club on UAE Golf Online - http://www.uae-golf-online.com Stunning ambience Sit outside for the views and shisha

Name: Le M  ridien Mina Seyahi Beach Resort   Marina
Reviews: Lovely place ..................... book the royal club room and gain access to the club lounge where you can have cocktails and receive breakfast and afternoon tea, plus wi-fi access around whole hotel. Lounge around the beach as much as possible. Awesome hotel & Barasti Beach Bar Alcohol is served from 11am!! Try the frozen margheritas Go for the package with breakfast, afternoon tea, apero and free soft drinks all day Chill in a Sofa T the beach and smoke Shisha Get a sea facing room.. Has a great view or the marina !! Getting a Sea View Room here will definitely be lovely, and hanging out at the beach, you could have a great view of the Burj Al Arab (you can also book a trip through the hotel to get here). Very delicious compliments drink Karkadi;) Get a sea view room with a great view of Atlantis and hotel grounds. Make use of free wifi and facilities in the Westin. Wind Down Wednesday at Ueno bar has live music, as well as wine and cheese menu I really liked the interiors of the hotel's lobby-level caf√©. Cool design. Great offer: day access to the beach and swimming pool with BBQ lunch

Name: Dubai Polo   Equestrian Club
Reviews: Don't ask for a diet coke, they don't serve it. Pepsi only, yuck! Vetcare. Your pet is kept healthy. Nice doc So right about Vetcare! The two vets Dr Dominic and Dr Evie are both wonderful Ask Theo the bartender for his special Theo mix. Take your kids for movie nights on thu and fri!Fantastic! Great place to relax, especially on a Saturday night before starting working week. Nice music, quiet atmosphere, good wine list... Do not watch the Euro 2012 Football here. There is no one watching it, the service is shit. Very recommended if you're trying to run away from the noise... Very relaxing. Movie nights each Thursday and Friday 6pm onwards at the pool. Great for the kids. The restaurant next to the stables Has horse flys unfortunately So use the one opposite the polo field instead The steak and mushroom pie was excellent Great secret for family fun on Fridays. Come w your car and friends and enjoy a picnic American football style from the trunk of your SUV while taking in a polo game or two. Get to venue early for Gold Cup day if you want front row I love working by the horses .. A bit windy today but nice. When will the service become acceptable? I love this place wether for a brunch or soft drink, this place is one of Dubai's heaven of Dubai it's one of my very favourite! Unique environment, try to make it for a polo match too! My workplace

Name: Al Sufouh Beach
Reviews: Great BBQ or hangout spot- currently 16*c degrees! Bring a jumper End of party One of the best Dubai beaches, very quiet and free of weirdos. Lovely place Bring towels and chairs if possible and plenty of water. No public toilets in the area but there is a petrol station that's 5-minutes away by car Good place for reading as it is peacefull and not much crowd. Sneakieat spot to catch fireworks!! Sneakiest spot to catch fireworks!! Lovely place at the night, wavy cold atmosphere makes u feel so fresh and calm :) feel the air, smell the sea..If u are with someone or even alone, trust me u'll enjoy the moment as i did. Beautiful water colour with spectacular sights of Atlantis, Burj Al Arab& B.Khalifa Best ever place to swim in Dubai It's a very nice place.It's a public beach.There is nothing there but sand and sea.So you need to get everything with you.But the atmosphere was great,the kids had a blast!Definitely a destination. Name: Grosvenor House Dubai
Reviews: Bar 44 on the .. hmm which floor ? go first to bar 44 - good views  /  and then down to buddha bar - good food and many russian girls. then back to hptel grosvenor house :-) The staff at The Gallery Bar on the 2nd floor are very friendly and have a great knowledge of the area, as well as cocktails. 5 stars! Good food, ok meeting venues. Service goes from fabulous to average depending on the individuals, but still a recommended venue in Dubai, especially for dinner. Special mention to Rhodes & Indego. Amazing Service and gorgeous rooms! Relax poolside and check out the snacks and smoothies at the poolside health bar. 1847 is one of the best men spa's. The staff is friendly & attentive. Ask for extra lotion if you get a pedicure. They give a short foot massage. Jet Set 4th floor is good for ladies hair The beat view in Dubai Marina ... Here, I come! The breakfast buffet is recommended; has lots of choices Access to the Internet is slow and frustrating. Go straight to the top (well, one floor shy), to Bar 44, of this 45-storey hotel for a cocktail. Or stay on the ground floor and meet at Buddha Bar. Very nice hotel and great amenities. Fitness center is better at tower two while pool is better at tower one. Internet is at times borderline unusable. Pay extra for premier room with club lounge access. Wonderful food, cocktails and immaculate service. Love this hotel. Nice weither@ Marina Dubai Swimming pool ÔòÑ Dont forget to have a dinner in buddah bar One of the best Ôëç Stay in Tower 1 much nicer Enjoy a nice retreat at the spa which features a hydrotherapy room, steam room, Jacuzzi, ice fountain and so much more. Lovely afternoon tea at Gary Rhodes my favorite hotel in Dubai, the best! My favorite non-resort SPG hotel in the world so far. The standard class room is white, modern, and spacious. A terrace overlooking the marina is perfect for enjoying the views of the famous Dubai Palm & for eating breakfast at the small outdoor table. Have a nice trip home. See you tomorrow. Wired & wireless Internet is complimentary at this hotel, but what is not obvious from the starwood website, the complimentary Internet is throttled after you reach 1 GB within the 24 hour period Excellent Internet connection speeds, see speedtest link. Perfectly understandable that they throttle the complimentary access after 1GB / day. You can pay to extend the high speed beyond that limit Once you have used up your complimentary 1GB / day data allocation (e.g. by running a speed test and making a short skype video call) the throttled speed is pretty much unusable. So 80 Dhs/day nolimit Great place to unwind! They hook up your PS3 for you! Such an amazing hotel! True luxury!  Must experience Level 5! Completely different class of hotel to every other hotel in Dubai. Staff make this hotel as brilliant as it is. Fabulous hotel and very nice apartments.
