Best place to live in One of the best places to have a walk around Love the place ! Love the greens ! The most beautiful area in Dubai ! I love living here; its safe, it's friendly, the pool is great and it is as the name suggests slightly greener than your average apartment area. Shot of The Greens taken from Tecom Great place for taking clients good walking and running options plus very good standard gyms for training clients  if maximized to its full potential great works to be had in this area ...I love this beautiful place, because I feel like at home, my homecountry (Czech Republic)... Very green area with real nature (plants, palms, singing birds etc.), nice people, good restaurants :c) The best place in Dubai Good grocery at choithram.

Name: Warehouse
Reviews: Sit out side during this lovely cool weather and enjoy from a wide selection of beer & wine and excellent food with a splendid service by the staff Chill out with wings and beer and a bunch of friends to talk shop Go for their Brunch or Rather Drunch (Crazy Place) The Mojito Friday Brunch is quite cool! Tapas style bites with a wide variety of 30 Mojitos! Drunch from 1-4 pm. Happy Hour from 4:00-7:30 pm. www.diningdubai.com Fish & Chips...! Must try on your next visit! The Burgundy snails are good. Friday brunch! prior booking is required! Thursday night ... Live band ... Not to be missed! Thursday night  .... Live band ... not to be missed! Try out da beers from different countries...its really kul!!! Love the band here .. Fantastic climate .. Cream of mushroom soup and the halibut is great. I tried to apply the 20% off 4square discount but staff didn't take it citing that I didn't dine inside the building (I sat outside).  That was a lame. If you love chicken, you've gotta try 'Chicken Tandoori' with rice here! LADIES NIGHT every Monday from 9pm. Ladies receive 3 regular drinks coupons including bubbly and Talkin' Loud Band is a must see band! Vodka Drunch- A Brunch with a twist! Check out the iPad menu! Arguably the best band in Dubai. Especially if you want to party! The special listed on Foursquare is no longer being honored.  Be ready for an argument! .................. They're sadly getting rid of the band on the 31st October 2012 - so make sure you come down and give Talkin' Loud some love before they go! Don't forget to check in on Foursquare and ask for the 20% off on your bill (November 2012). Unlike other places they are true to their word. Depressing now without the band here in the evenings! The bouncer upstairs is always looking for fights.. Just for fun.. Beware.. Aircrew night has been changed to wednesdays... Bullfrog is the best here. Chicken samosa is yummyyyy A good hangout place with friends at evening...near to Dubai Airport The staff is very rude, and keep your drinks close as the staff keep on taking the glasses even when they are half full. Very disappointed. mushroom truffle soup!!! lovely

Name: Aquara
Reviews: Great ambience on the terrace. The salmon main course and prawn main course were far too salty; probably a one off. Overall, good food and service! Friday Brunch is on 2.30pm to 3.30pm. They got a Mojito station, oyster and seafood bars, sushi counter, hot and cold Mezzah, fresh salads bar and hot dishes. Check out their dessert room too! Don't ask for a spritz they don't have aperol!! If you ask for campari they Will charge extra:-) Get a cheese platter and a bottle of grape beverage at the Dubai Marina Yacht Club for AED only 128 (Value AED 255) with Cobone.com. Name: Els Golf Club
Reviews: Up there with Earth course and Emirates Hills as best track in Dubai The new clubhouse due open this year is going to be a winner favoloso!!!!! Whether you play Golf professionally or for jun, it's one of the best play to enjoy in luxury style Will need to play If you‚Äôre lucky, you might catch Butch Harmon, Ernie Els, or Claude Harmon dropping by The Els Club! Try the 261 meatball sandwich... It also has some huge significance ... Ask the club staff about it!  ;) Tiger Woods was trained by Butch Harmon himself. You'll see his autographs on the flags inside the Butch Harmon building as it's a tradition for winners to give the 18th flag to their instructor. What a beautiful but tough track!  Use the yardage to the front of the green helps a lot Great Place, Great Service, Lovely Golf Course and View After playing a game of golf at The Els Club at DUBAILAND, visit the clubhouse to unwind and enjoy their delicious meals! Great lounge for business meetings.... Find out more about the Els Golf Club on UAE Golf Online - http://www.uae-golf-online.com Great course as long as you stay out of the sand on the sides. Chicken wings and steak and Guinness pie are on point at the 2161! TEC just upped its membership value with the opening of The Member's Private Lounge!  Billiards and pricate balcony over looking the 18th Green... Well done TEC!

You feel no less than Schumaher here. :) Nice outdoor track but it's hard to book (Personally don't recall managing to get through to anyone on the phone). Usually ending up showing up & waiting for at least 30-45 minutes for the next round 15 minutes of Karting gets your adrenaline pumping. Try the outdoor track.. Name: ICON Bar   Lounge
Reviews: Try the cheese burger. Best in media city and sure to put you in a food coma!!! trilogy burger, nice chilled out environment Avoid the minestrone, unless you like bland flavourless soup w.beans & vege. Friday brunch is a lot of fun. Guinness on tap! Can't go wrong w the club sandwich. Peroni on tap is fresh and cold. Fish and Chips is the best bargain on the menu and is good for a snack. The classic angus beef burge, a beer. Great lunch break. They stopped serving alcohol between 4 and 6 pm. Poor anglosaxons..5 Service sucked, as always. Decent beers still make it an okay meeting place, though. Calamari fries is perfect Belgian beers, and plenty others. Ask for the list! Bruschetta & quesadillas are pretty delish! The fruit smoothie is a must have if you're the designated driver If you can afford it, their burgers are really something to try. And they're big. Also, come on Friday's for Happy Hour specials. Name: McGettigan s JLT
Reviews: 35 AED a pint :-( The burger is heavenly!!!! 50Dhs for Magners! Nice beer garden, great large outdoor screen, but they don't do shisha :( Don't order crisps, it seems to very complicated for them a. to understand what they are and b. to get them once they grasp what you're asking for. My tip, bring your own Yuki is very Yucky. Beware of rude, ugly bar staff Great lighting with lots of wood decor like a mountain lodge and a huge outdoor space to boot! Located across from the Spinney's and down the stairs Red neck central :S never again! service sucks, nothing special about the place itself.. can't really recommend at all.. Bring ear plugs. The Irish music is truly awful. Food average yet expensive. Cannot recommend. From a true afficionado, try the burger. Makes Shake Shack look like Shame Shack. Bangers and mash is amazing!! that chinese waitress is very feisty! she scares us all - heeeeeeee yahhhhh Forget about the music, focus on the fish and chips... yum! Service isn't great, food is good but expensive. Be sure to take an Entertainer voucher! Food is good,but expensive,specially for bar food, music too loud. Worst bar staff in the whole city! Beware of yuki! Bottles of Magners are always expensive, whetever you go. Draft is standard price. My personal favourite for a Saturday (morning). Best place to watch Rugby World Cup and have a tipple. They don't serve nibbles !! Pathetic!! So order the Great mixed platter!! Nice place, good service. Music is not too loud, and cost of beer like in other plases in Dubai. Like it Ice cold Guiness and a great wuyagi chilli. Try it One of the coolest places in Dubai Wooow best irish pub iPaddy Pub Quiz every Tuesday! Win an iPad and lots of other cool prizes! Modern decor. Beautiful people. Great buzz. Kilkenny that tastes different (over chilled maybe) from anywhere else and that's not a compliment! Jlt's must see! What the hell, its like hell here with NO A.C. Great place Nice (ACed) beer garden for the Euro 2012... Would avoid the place if I could.nothing special...food is below average...smoky atmosphere...annoying people. Magners!! In Dubai. Fuck yes. Not bad on weeknights, but overcrowded at weekends. 20 minutes wait to get served at the bar and so smoky that even smokers find it unpleasant The interior looks nice. The place seems to attract mostly Brit crowd of all ages. Music has hardly any volume. Beer was cold enough. Haven't tried food, so no comment. Fish n chips... :) Cool place to hang out. Good place to watch football. My best place in town for weekdays, the burger there is AMAZING, however the staff is definitely the worst I've ever seen! SO DAMN RUDE, unhelpful, slobs and mean! Dirty. Short on buss staff. Took forever to get us a menu then asked us to order on the spot. Smells like shit This is what you get after waiting 40 mnts for food?!!!! Never coming back again. The Chilli Cheese fries are awesome, especially with a pint of the black stuff After 22:00 try two things: Chips With Parmesan, Garlic and Herbs Sauce, and Scampi With Chips Nice place Changed my mind, this place is a smelly, soulless, noisy dive with an unfriendly atmosphere and terrible service. It attracts the kind of idiots who think that identikit "Irish" pubs are brilliant! The best place to view English Premier League football, including all the 3PM Saturday kick-offs across various screens! Love this place but the live band can get a bit too loud The only bar in Dubai that has atmosphere of a real bar/pub.. Wish the food was less expensive... Everyone should try hot wings! Ma fiksh tkoun lebnene w t2oul McGettigan's 7xtimes wara ba3don min doon ma tghallit The Burger is a must! Amazing. A mug of Hoegarden from here is amazing. Great music played here. A must visit when in DXB. Great beers and great live epl games projection

Same food every single day. sick of eating sausage and egg swimming pool For location i will give 2 out of 5 as us its not close to metro so u have to get a cab that takes 10 dhs to drop to burjaman metro station. The rooms,service plus food and environment gets 10 on 10 Not much options when it comes to food but booze (red,white wine,vidka whiskey)is refillable so fine by me :D Amazing service staff :)

Name: The Ritz Carlton
Reviews: Complimentary breakfast, lunch and Dinner / beverages all times for Special Club Guests Beautiful Lobby Lounge on the podium level of the hotel with a terrace overlooking the 40 meter water fall!! Cool inner court bar terrace when you wait for a meeting/event to kick off... Grand yet very homey hotel rooms with massive beds! Excellent coffee - even the decaff tastes like coffee Great value set lunches Sun to Fri. AED 85 in Can Can (French) and Blue Rain (Thai), and AED 105 in Center Cut (Steak House). Almost as cheap as a sandwich in DIFC! Check out the courtyard patio on the 3rd floor, a good outdoor chiller/meeting area Worst Ramadan tent ever! Service sucks big time! Saturday night. Thai-pas. Choose six starters and six mains (smaller than a la carte) for AED 190. Get a free bottle of wine for every two people. Makes this great value. Cool bar on podium level for after work drinks Don't miss the gym!! Enough to be at the Ritz Carlton. It's a place to be. They have turkey bacon!!! And it's crispy!! Heaven Hotel is quite boring with much of the typical oblivious dubai hotel staff you find in many hotels around (I.e friendly but incompetent and lost). NOT the Four Seasons. Gym staff is awkward, useless. Coffee time Not satisfied with their valet service.. Tom yum soup! Spicy! Lovely terrace Try their Basel green ice tea in the lobby. It's delicious! Great rooms! Nespresso machine in the room. Transparent glass bathroom walls :) You've arrived! Time to relax and get a good night's sleep. Check out these sleep tips from LARK by clicking on the link to help you get extra relaxed Blue Rain; the best penang wagyu beef curry The gym is great Good place in dubai. Good shisha cozy setting n yummy champollion soup :) Lovely terrace at the Podium <3 Are U kind.. So R they,,, Excellent hotel for both business and pleasure.. facilities are very good. Now I can tell u all .. The rits carlton is the sweetest and the best hotel here ... About me I'm in love Best terrace !!! üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé Rooms looks nice but the Swiming pool looks nothing like the one showing on their website.. Small pool with few seats They didn't lie whn they said ritz have best mattresses .. It felt like sleeping on clouds Y12 is a great place to get your hair done If suffering from jet lag, head to The Ritz-Carlton Spa, to enjoy a Jet Lag Recovery Ritual.  The 80 minute treatment starts with dry brushing followed by a stress-busting massage.

Name: QD s
Reviews: Reminds me of the navy club in mumbai Al fresco restaurant offering shisha, drinks and food overlooking the creek. The Valentino is a great pizza for vegetarians. Outdoors by the creek, nice grills. Raspberry sunset pitcher and vg shisha. Must try Sheesh Tawook here! Good Sheesha Place to hang out during Winters Good place to grab a Shisha and hang out by the water. Amazing sheesha - best ever. Bad service though. Nice view, nice food, really nice place to hang out in Sit by the water , shisha nice jazz music , in weekends be there before 8:00 or call for table reservation the new York cheese cake is great but too small ;-) Good shisha. Peach mint is awesome. Good atmosphere. Shisha sucks Music here ALWAYS sux Not serving alcohol during the month of Ramadan! Iftar buffet spread is good and costs Aed. 120. Hiked up Shisha prices to Aed. 50 & 55 for Special. Nice Shisha Great ambiance and sheesha, limited variety for food though! Shisha - 4.5 on 5; Food - 3.5 on 5; Ambiance - 4.5 on 5; Seating - 2.5 on 5; Internet - NA; Pricing - 4.5 on 5 (5 being ridiculously expensive); Ideal Group Size - 6 to 10 people; Alcohol is served. Try the sheesha cherry & grapes flavor The service is bad Shisha is the best in town, definitely worth all the trouble to get there. The service is not fantastic, THERE IS NO COFFEE, waiters are rude to show you the next lot as the cafe if you want a coffee. Amazing ambiance! Beware in winter... They no longer serve hot drinks (tea, coffee etc.) Brrrrr. No hot drinks. That's 25% of the menu. Wondering what's the point. Stupid. Nice music Calamari and Cheesecake. The shisha is nice and the ambience is great. A good spot for chillin'. Great environment and creek view. Variety of food selection and cocktails and Can also grab sheesha. Busy on wednesdays. Zevkli bir mekan Lemon mint sheesha, the best in town!!! Pan Sheesha ... The best sheesha so far in Dubai Booze, sisha, and a lovely view! Perfect! Went for the first time. Good ambience but rude staff! Service is pathetic and you might receive the bill on your table without asking for it! Great setup for the summer, air conditioned tent. You can watch football from every corner! Only hang-out....skip the food! Good food, drinks, shisha, DJ playing music, and it's outdoors right by the creek. Definite recommendation. Nice place :) Good music) Best sheesha Nice Shisha, nice ambience. Music SUX! Very good pizza margarita and pepperoni! They don't have hot drinks in evening - no tea, no coffee, only alcohol and sparking water! Worst service ever...They aren't serving coffee nor tea & yes they won't even cancel your order. Such a waste Ôò° The lamb chops and beef moussaka are a must try! No hot drinks????? Ridiculous! Serving some hot water with a tea bag is not too much to ask for! QD's sunset could be guite nice without spicy. Best Sheesha  in town !!! Nice place If you're into Pizzas, try the pepperoni pizza. I tried it and love it :-))) Excellent Shisha and some very nice lamb chops with cold draught beer to accompany it! Outdoors next to the river...lovely location in the winters Shisha is great! Music is great! View, ambiance are great! What else? :) Perfect ambiance for couple celebrating something special. A nice place for friends to hang out. Smooth sheesha.... must try while in dubai pig out with my fambam! we love the ambiance..the drinks and the food on my plate (nonetheless, seafoods) ! lol Great Ambiance and shisha Amazing view. Amazing ambience.  Expensive hookahs. Friendly service. Nice place for evenings when the weather is cool and balmy. Table by yhe water was perfect.

Name: At The Top  Observation Deck
Reviews: At The Top is a great visit to experience to be in the current tallest skyscraper in the world - Burj Khalifa :) Visited it this year on Mother's Day Make sure you bring some drinking water especially if you plan to take your kids also cause there's no drinking water available Need to take a picture from the topic of the tower! 9 Sep 2010-- took us up and down on a service elevator after an hour long wait. Terrible experience! beat view in dxb Breathtaking view of Dubai You really won't get to the "top" of it coz you're only allowed to reach the 124th floor. :p Book a couple of days in advance. It's only AED100 rather than AED400 enterance fee AED100. U should make a reservation! clean the Deck glass!!! my photos are full of dust.. Breathtaking!! Avoid it if you fear heights been here last March 31, 2011 Tickets im Internet mit mindestens 48h Vorlauf kaufen oder vor Ort. Meistens ausverkauft. Am besten gleich am ersten Tag holen, um am letzten Urlaubstag auf den Burj zu kommen. Preis 100 DHS (20‚Ç¨). I see it from my office window every day...still amazing to look at...!!! Are you attending Mounir concert? Check in at any of our outlets & that will be your pass to the guest list of the after party and hangout with Mohamed Mounir personally :) Huge queues to go back down.. Shell out at least 3 hours for a good look around the place. Visit at sunset, the view is awesome! Get tickets online before you go and save 300dirhams! Also, don't stress if you're running a few minutes late. Park the car at the fashio center parking directions at the Dubai mall. Go just before dusk to get day and night shots of Dubai Leave plenty of time to get there as it takes a while to get there through the Mall and then the queue for the lifts I love the view Just woach Take lots of pics!! Both sunset and night time view is good. The walk to the Top is well done. Very clean and well maintained. If you go at night... Dont miss the fountain show from the top Not worth it if you're paying 400AED, according to me. You really won't get to the "top" of it coz you're only allowed to reach the 124th floor. :p Need to take a picture from the topic of the tower! Must see :) At The Top is a great visit to experience to be in the current tallest skyscraper in the world - Burj Khalifa :) Visited it this year on Mother's Day There are openings in the glass to take photos through outside. 400AED, no booking required and you get to cut all the queues. Get tickets online they are far cheaper than if you buy them on-site Nice place to visit Just get your tickets through Internet or be prepared to pay 400Dhs Only DHS100. Book 2-3 days in advance. If you want to be different from others; u have to observe differently from others. Breathtaking view from the Observation Deck of Burj Khalifa: not to miss. (Bucket List) If you are here in the evening do see the fountain from the top. Don't buy tickets for telescope,in my opinion, it doesn't worth it Ticket am besten online buchen. Name: Pint
Reviews: All food here takes 20-25 mins but the Kilkenny comes fast and fresh! It's a smoking area so sit away from the chimneys Eid Mubarak :) Comfort seating! great service! Highly irresponsible but encouragingly named bar. Tea for one for the win. Probably the only place at DXB airport where you can have a drink and smoke Quieter than neighboring Irish Village bar and way more comfortable seats. Terribly cheesy music. But not as smoky as the Irish Village...

Name: Republique
Reviews: Come by Republique from 9PM-3AM on weekends for the best music, guaranteed. And stop by on weekdays for indie rock, jazz, soul & pop on weekdays at the upstairs bar. The best music in town, all week Not gonna bash about the place, lets say it was a very unpleasant experience. not to mention the slow service & the bad music. Thursday is 80s and 90s night. Incredible music and unlike anything played in Dubai. Give it a try if you care more about dancing and singing than posing :D Friday is the best of Beirut with DJ Kam- Dance, Rock, RnB and even some 80s to keep the party going until 3 AM. It gets busy early so come before 11 :D Great venue...amazing music and service....highly recommended! If you like indie rock and rock in general, swing by the upstairs lounge & bar at Republique. Amazing music. Everything from Cut Copy to Phoenix and from Depeche Mode to Oasis. Slickness maDJam nights rock here!! Awesome venue, crap music. This place is awesome, But unfortunately some people here sucks Don't miss Dion Mavath & friends every Tuesday night for the most fun ladies night in Dubai. The new Tuesday nights are the official Cosmopolitan Magazine ladies nights in Dubai. Literally hundreds of girls and it was busy super early too (Photo was taken at 10PM) If you're looking for commercial house music, this is not the club for you- Republique is about ALL good music. Could be rock, 80s, old school hiphop, 90s Dance & everything in between. Had a great time there :)) I must return some time soon :) Its French Night every Tuesday. Seriously amazing vibe If you drop a pin on center of the map of Dubai, it would land on the DJ booth at Republique. If you ONLY like house music and/or posing and/or playing with sparklers, go somewhere else because there's none of that at Republique and its refreshing! Awesome for a change of scene & music Best club in town !!! Don't miss to go there Nice music, good crowd can get trashy sometimes. BUT dont take your wallet with you and watch out for your phone, lot of robberies happened recently in this place& their surveillance cams doesnt work! Not bad.. Good place for clubbing. Not bad.. Just a bit tight.. Always too crowded. Very tiny club but very friendly stuff and very danceable music. Get there a bit earlier to listen to the band upstairs. Music genre changes every night Cool place, owners are good people!

Name: TECOM
Reviews: Lovely living environment, still under development but all facilities & amenities exist. A blend of residential, hotels, hotel apartments & shops in the same area of medium rise. Very convenient area to live in, Carrefour, geant, gyms, barber shops and laundries walking distance away.  2 minutes from DMC and 7 mins from MOE. Great Neighborhood  with a lot of Hotels, Clubs, Cafes, Convenience Stores and supermarkets. Check out this deal for ladies on Cobone: Organic Acai Brazilian Nut Oil Hair Care for AED 960 from Dial a Nail Boutique Salon with home kit! (Value AED 1600) ht.ly/9djVt Tecom ladies, check out this Cobone.com offer: Organic Acai Brazilian Nut Oil Hair Care for AED 960 from Dial a Nail Boutique Salon with home kit! (Value AED 1600) ht.ly/9djVt home sweet home Yah its the most amusing place I'm living Less than 10 minutes to get to DIC/DMC/KV and around half that time to get back (depending on where you love exactly). No traffic and a quiet neighborhood in general If you like jogging go to the greens signal and follow the along the borders of greens, meadows etc and around the jebel ali club. Good 8.5km long route not far from Tecom, 10 min away u can find Al Barsha Park u can find basketball court,tennis,volley ball, beach volley ball, out door gym, running track around a big lake , a kids area & its all free! many supermarkets in the neighbourhood; bluemart, carrefour express, geant. A quiet area of Tecom

Name: Dubai Sports World
Reviews: Feel like a work out or some sports? Try this place. They even have showers and lockers. Get fit! Welcome to our all-new venue: Dubai Sports World. Enthusiasts can expect an even more exciting DSW with new sports and activities added to the order of play. DSW stays open from June - September. Register now and enter the draw to win 4 pairs of tickets to the Thrilling Dubai Indoor Football Championship! http://bit.ly/DSWregister Are you worried that it is going to be a boring summer this year? No way, get fit and tone up at Dubai Sports World www.dubaisportsworld.ae Alongside the Dubai Indoor Football Championship tournaments, 8- 13 July 2012, we'll be hosting football clinics so the newest generation of football prodigies get a chance to learn from the best. Did you know that every Saturday, between 8 June and 31 August it is Ladies only from 8am to 3pm at Dubai Sports World? Make sure to put all the match days of the Euro 2012 in your diary. We thought it would be very helpful to compile a schedule on our website, please find the link here: http://bit.ly/McAh0f Make sure to check in at Dubai Sports World's venue tomorrow! MPAC Basketball will have 3 programmes on offer this summer. Read more on our website to find out how you can slam dunk summer boredom http://bit.ly/MnatP4 In two days from now we will reward the Mayor of Dubai Sports World with tickets to the exciting Dubai Indoor Football Championship! Make sure to check-in! Get a free VIP ticket to Dubai Indoor Football Championship on your first check-in at Dubai Sports World. Newbie Special! We will make your work-out even more enjoyable by broadcasting the Olympics live on a large screen at Dubai Sports World! Make sure to check-in before Dubai Sports World 2012 comes to an end this Friday. We have been updating you on all the latest news from Dubai Sports World 2012, and now we are gearing up for Dubai Sports World 2013. Dubai Sports World 2013 is held from 15 June to 25 August. This was my first time playing indoors and the airxonditioned arena helps with the weather, but the courts need improving. Some of the turf tiles had bad bounce, ball skids on if it hits the line.

Don't come on weekdays especially during school holidays as many activities are exclusively for the kidzania holiday club until late afternoon/evening. Its also v quiet. Weekends (Fri/Sat) is better. A great place for kids to play and explore. They get to take on different roles and jobs to earn money which can be used to buy goodies when they're done from kidzainia store. Name: LK Studio UAE
Reviews: LK Studio UAE shared Dubai Motor City's photo. A great National Day to all :) I'm loving the flags and decorations on all the cars and buildings :) "Mary-May Edson, for some reason..." on their own status. Congratulations!!!!!!! to Mary-May Edson and her lovely family for winning the free family session with LK studio UAE We had such a great time with all the moms, dads and little ones today, what a successful day  Remember winners of the family session will be announced on 1 December. Hi all you wonderful people who have liked this page, I've received some questions about the competition that's on my wall.  Winners will be announced on the 1st of December and it will be a full family session either at the park or at the beach valued at AED850.  So keep liking the page :) "Yes there is space at 1. Or..." on their own status. LK Studio UAE likes a status. We have had such positive feedback regarding the shoot on the 29th, we still have space available from 12 to 3. Don't miss out Thank you for all the new likes!!!! :)) One of you will be the lucky winner of a full family session which includes 20 edited pictures at a location of your choice, either beach, desert or park.  Save the date: 29 November and book your shoot. Just finished a new born photo session, what a little angel, mom glowing :), now back to the editing table, memories to be shared soon. xoxo LK Studio UAE updated their cover photo. Early morning shoot in the desert this morning, what a sunrise, wow I'm loving the weather in Dubai, winter is almost here :) Busy week ahead, we have a couple shoot, baby and a family shoot <3 love is in the air <3 Had the most amazing maternity session, been busy editing them for the past 12 hours. shoewee! A blessed Divali to all <3 <3 may your light shine bright. :) LK Studio UAE likes Jumeirah English Speaking School - Arabian Ranches's album School Campus. EAT DRINK AND BE SCARY, Happy Halloween to all the kiddies tonight, wish I could have been there. LK Studio UAE added a new photo. Is everyone's dress up organised? Halloween is going to be a blast this year, so excited <3 <3 "He was a real gem <3" on their own album. LK Studio UAE updated their cover photo. Not even a month old and all ready breaking hearts. LK Studio UAE added a new photo. LK Studio UAE added a new photo. LK Studio UAE added a new photo. Back to work for everyone here in Dubai, did everyone have a great holiday? We had a great newborn shoot, can't wait to see the end result! :))
